interpretation: The zipper-mouth face emoji represents secrecy, keeping quiet, and withholding information. It can indicate a need to be discreet and cautious with what you say or share. It can also suggest that you are feeling hesitant or unsure about expressing yourself, and may be holding back out of fear of judgment or criticism. This card can serve as a reminder to think before you speak, and to consider the potential consequences of your words. It can also encourage you to trust your intuition and listen more than you speak. Overall, the zipper-mouth face reminds us that sometimes the most powerful message is the one left unsaid.
